document.full_text: ugandan police shot at a crowd in the capital kampala after it attacked a car carrying nigeria's president goodluck jonathan who had attended president yoweri museveni's inauguration, a government spokesman said.
document.title: uganda police open fire as nigeria leader's car stoned
lines_and_colors: ugandan police shot at a crowd in the capital kampala after it attacked a car carrying nigeria's president goodluck jonathan who had attended president yoweri museveni's inauguration, a government spokesman said.
